feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens and quotation marks similarly, indicating consistency in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: There is consistency in lexical and grammatical features such as word choice and part of speech usage.

feature3.explanation: Sentence structure and length show similarities in complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: Text and discourse features like tone and narrative style are comparable.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were present in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistency in punctuation, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
